import React, {useState} from 'react'; import Axios from 'axios'; import '../App.css' import Popup from '../popup' import Doctor from '../components/doctorDashboard' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; function Profile() { // const[list, setList]=useState([]) const [name,setName]=useState(useParams().name) const [password,setPassword]=useState(useParams().password) const [designation,setDesignation]=useState(useParams().designation) const [gender,setGender]=useState(useParams().gender) const [address,setAddress]=useState(useParams().address) const [highest_qualification,setHighest_Qualification]=useState(useParams().highest_qualification) // const getData = () => { // Axios.post('http://localhost:3001/profile').then(res => { // setList(res.data) // }) // } // getData(); const UpdateProfile = ()=>{ alert("name : "+name +"\n password : "+ password + "\ndesignation : " + designation + "\ngender : "+ gender + "\naddress : " + address + "\nhighest_Qualification : " + highest_qualification) Axios.put("http://localhost:3001/update_admin", { name: name, password: password, designation: designation, gender: gender, address: address, highest_qualification: highest_qualification }) } return(
{/*

Your Profile

*/}

Account Details

{/*
*/}
{setName(e.target.value)}} >
{setPassword(e.target.value)}} defaultValue={password}>
{setDesignation(e.target.value)}} defaultValue={designation} >
{setGender(e.target.value)}} defaultValue={gender}>
{setAddress(e.target.value)}} defaultValue={address}>
{setHighest_Qualification(e.target.value)}} defaultValue={highest_qualification}>
) } export default Profile;
